description: A singular runtime dependency for applications on the DHIS2 platform
author: Austin McGee <austin@dhis2.org>

scripts.build:playground: cd examples/query-playground && yarn && PUBLIC_URL=/playground yarn build:standalone && cp -rf build/app ../../dist/playground
scripts.build: yarn build:services && yarn build:runtime && yarn install:examples
scripts.format: d2-style apply js --all --no-stage && d2-style apply text --all --no-stage
scripts.start: yarn build && cd examples/query-playground && yarn start
scripts.docs:build: mkdir -p dist && cp docs/index.html dist/ && yarn build:playground
scripts.lint: d2-style check js && d2-style check text

docsite.name: DHIS2 Application Runtime
docsite.description: A singular runtime dependency for applications on the [DHIS2 platform](https://platform.dhis2.nu)
